messages.subject: Re: Videogames
messages.msgSnippet: Has anyone played Throne of Darkness then?I only played the demo and it was pretty much like Diablo II,except that you can play with more than one character...
messages.messageBody:
Has anyone played Throne of Darkness then?I only played the demo and it was pretty much like Diablo II,except that you can play with more than one character...


"Like these blossoms,we all die..." - Katsumoto Moritsugu
